Event.name: Quitting
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Employee</fen> voluntarily leaves the service of an <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Empee">Leah</fex> <t>quit</t> <fex name="Position">her job</fex> <fex name="Time">after one month</fex> <fex name="Explanation">because of an evil force</fex>.</ex>
<ex> It's Time for <fex name="Empee">Glenn Hubbard</fex> to <t>Quit</t> <fex name="Position">as CEA Chair</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Emper">Its chief executive officer</fex> has <t>resigned</t> <fex name="Explanation">amid a reorganization that will also eliminate about 20 percent of its work force</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Position">Its chief executive officer</fex> has <t>resigned</t> amid a reorganization that will also eliminate about 20 percent of its work force.</ex> <ex>You should fill in your name, the defendant's name, and <fex name="Time">the date and time</fex> <fex name="Emper">you</fex> <t>gave</t> <t>notice</t>. <fex name="Position">DNI</fex></ex>
</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is obligated to perform some task in order to receive compensation.
<ex><fex name="Empee">I</fex> just <t>quit</t> yesterday!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person (or institution) in whose employ the <fen>Employee</fen> stood.
<ex>He replaces Michael Lawrie, 50, who <t>quit</t> <fex name="Emper">IBM</fex> to run Siebel.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Field that one works in. <ex>He might <t>quit</t> <fex name="Field">showbusiness</fex> for years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Employee</fen> leaves the job.
<ex> Los Angeles junior high school teacher named Patricia Ann Carruthers <t>quit</t> her job <fex name="Mnr">in a huff</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> quits the employment of the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>Actually I<t>quit</t> <fex name="Place">in the lobby</fex> before I got to my office.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition: <def-root>The label given to a particular type of service that the employer quits. <ex> I <t>quit</t> <fex name="Position">as a professional player</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Employee</fen> quits the employment of the <fen>Employer</fen>. <ex>John <t>resigned</t> <fex name="Purpose">to join the private sector</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the Time when an <fen>Employee</fen> quits the employment of the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>Guess who just <t>quit</t> <fex name="Time">today</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which the <fen>Employee</fen> quits.
<ex>North <t>quit</t> <fex name="Explanation">over the mismanagement scandal</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The means whereby the act of quitting is accomplished <ex><fex name="Time">Lately,</fex> <fex name="Employee">many workers</fex> have been <t>quitting</t> <fex name="Means">by simply not showing up for work</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: resign.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: voluntarily leave a job or position of office.

lexUnit.name: retire.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: leave one's job and cease to work, especially because one has reached a particular age.

lexUnit.name: stand down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to resign from (a job) due to pressure

lexUnit.name: retirement.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or fact of retiring.

lexUnit.name: give notice.idio
lexUnit.definition: FN: to notify one's employer of a resignation

lexUnit.name: step down.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: withdraw or resign from a position or office.
